title: Tree Globe
summaries: The Tree Globe is a thrown consumable item sold by the Zoologist for 3 after 50% of the Bestiary (270 entries) has been filled out. When a Tree Globe is thrown, all of the trees in the current biome will switch to another random style.

statistics.Tooltip:
Toss it to change how trees look!
'Time for a change of scenery'
statistics.Buy: 3
statistics.Sell: 60
